content: #################################### minjia poncho abbreviations k=knit p=purl m1r= make one right m1l= make one left m= marker slm= slip marker pm= place marker co= cast on bobble=bind off please use 4 markers 2 of a different color or shape color/shape a & b = markers 1a 1b 2a 2b after you have slipped the last marker 1a you are ready to start the next round circular needles at least 100cm/40 long co= even number of sts + 10= 5sts+odd no of sts+ 5sts+ odd no of sts *gauge 14sts and 20rows= 4 /10cm on us10/6mm in stockinette st gauge is not critical minjia poncho pattern can be adapted to different yarn weights and various sizes *co 92 sts magic loop join in a round without twisting pm 1a the collar/ turtleneck/ cowl *k1 p1* repeat from *to* slip the marker as you go knit up 5-30cm/2-12 inches depending on your individual design set up rounds k5 pm 1b k41 pm 2a k5 pm 2b k41 slm 1a round 1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 slm k41 slm k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 slm k41 slm round 2 k5 slm m1l k41 m1r slm k5 slm m1l k41 m1r slm pattern rounds round 1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 slm k until next m slm k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 slm k until next m slm round 2 k5 slm m1l k until next m m1r slm k5 slm m1l k until next m m1r slm design by martina sommer sommerelfchen this entire pattern minjia poncho and it s design are subject to copyright this material may not be used for commercial purposes without my authorisation 2015 ################################### -2- repeat rounds 1&2 until you are happy with the size of your poncho please save enough yarn for the last seven rounds and bobble round finish round 1 *k1 p1* repeat **all around slip all markers as you go round 2 k all sts slip the markers as you go repeat rounds 1&2 two times knit round 1 one more time remove all markers as you go bobble loosely weave in ends soak squeeze out excessive moisture sensitively shake gently allow to dry flat happy knitting wear your minjia poncho with pride & joy or make it a lovely gift for someone special design by martina sommer sommerelfchen this entire pattern minjia poncho and it s design are subject to copyright this material may not be used for commercial purposes without my authorisation 2015
